001import java.util.Stack;
002
003/**
004 * D�crivez votre classe GameEngine ici.
005 *
006 * @author (votre nom)
007 * @version (un num�ro de version ou une date)
008 */
009public class GameEngine
010{
011    // variables d'instance - remplacez l'exemple qui suit par le v�tre
012    private Room aCurrentRoom;
013    private Parser aParser;
014    private UserInterface aGui;
015    private Stack<Room> aPreviousRooms;
016
017    /**
018     * Constructeur d'objets de classe GameEngine
019     */
020    public GameEngine()
021    {
022        this.createRooms();
023        this.aParser = new Parser();
024        this.aPreviousRooms = new Stack<Room>();
025    }
026
027    /**
028     * Setter pour l'interface utilisateur.
029     * @param pUserInterface interface utilisateur
030     */
031    public void setGUI( final UserInterface pUserInterface )
032    {
033        this.aGui = pUserInterface;
034        this.printWelcome();
035    }
036
037    /**
038     * Initialise position actuel et des salles du Game avec la description et sorties par defaut.
039     */
040    private void createRooms() {
041        Room vOutside = new Room(
042                "standing outside the secret laboratory, \nthe entrance looming ahead with an air of mystery and danger.","entrance.jpg");
043        Room vStorage = new Room(
044                "in a cluttered storage room, \nfilled with various discarded objects and tools.","storage.jpg");
045        Room vClean = new Room(
046                "in the clean room, \na sterile area where disinfection and changing take place. \nThe air smells faintly of chemicals, \nand a row of lockers lines the wall.","clean.jpg");
047        Room vMeeting = new Room(
048                "in the meeting room, \nwhere scientists plan their experiments. \nA large table and chairs dominate the space, \nand diagrams cover the walls.","meeting.jpg");
049        Room vPrison = new Room(
050                "in the prison room, \nwhere human subjects are held in confinement. \nThe air feels heavy with tension.","prison.jpg");
051        Room vAnimal = new Room(
052                "in the animal room, a isolated space \nwhere animals, transformed by experiments, are kept in cages. \nThe room is eerily quiet.","animal.jpg");
053        Room vArchive = new Room(
054                " in the archive room, a space \nfilled with shelves of files and records. \nEach document holds secrets about the experiments conducted here.","archive.jpg");
055        Room vExperimentation = new Room(
056                "in the experimentation room, \nwhere the darkest of the laboratory's procedures are carried out. \nSurgical beds and strange equipment fill the space.","exprience.png");
057        Room vAleatoire = vAnimal; // random room, pas encore fait
058
059        vOutside.setExits("south", vStorage);
060        vOutside.addItem("a discarded apple core", 30,"appleCore");
061
062        vStorage.setExits("down", vClean);
063        vStorage.setExits("north", vOutside);
064        vStorage.addItem("a key for the cabinet in the archives room", 30,"archiKey");
065        vStorage.addItem("an invisibility Cloth can help you hide", 5,"inviCloth");
066        vStorage.addItem("a torn piece of paper with the name Alice", 2,"paperAlice");
067        vStorage.addItem("a plan of the entire laboratory", 8,"planLabo");
068        
069        vClean.setExits("west", vMeeting);
070        vClean.setExits("south", vAleatoire);
071        vClean.setExits("up", vStorage);
072        vClean.addItem("an access card for the experiment room",10,"experCard");
073        vClean.addItem("a magic cake can break the restriction that prevents you from lifting objects over 40 kg",30,"magiCake");
074        
075        vMeeting.setExits("east", vClean);
076        vMeeting.setExits("west", vArchive);
077        vMeeting.setExits("south", vPrison);
078        vMeeting.setExits("north", vAnimal);
079
080        vPrison.setExits("north", vMeeting);
081
082        vAnimal.setExits("west", vExperimentation);
083        vAnimal.setExits("south", vMeeting);
084
085        vArchive.setExits("east", vMeeting);
086        vArchive.setExits("north", vExperimentation);
087
088        vExperimentation.setExits("east", vAnimal);
089        vExperimentation.setExits("south", vArchive);
090
091        this.aCurrentRoom = vOutside;
092    }
093
094    /**
095     * Deplacer le joueur dans une direction donnee.
096     * @param pCmd commande de deplacement
097     */
098    private void goRoom(final Command pCmd) {
099        if (!pCmd.hasSecondWord()) {
100            this.aGui.println("Go where ?");
101            return;
102        }
103        String vDirection = pCmd.getSecondWord();
104        Room vNextRoom = this.aCurrentRoom.getExit(vDirection);
105        if(vNextRoom==null){
106            this.aGui.println("There is no door !");
107            this.printLocationInfo();
108            return;
109        } else{
110            this.aPreviousRooms.push(aCurrentRoom);
111            this.aCurrentRoom = vNextRoom;
112            this.printLocationInfo();
113        }
114    }
115
116    /**
117     * Deplacer le joueur dans la salle précédante.
118     * @param pCmd commande de deplacement
119     */
120    private void back(final Command pCmd) {
121        if (pCmd.hasSecondWord()) {
122            this.aGui.println("You cannot specify a direction when going back.");
123            return;
124        }else if(this.aPreviousRooms.isEmpty()){
125            this.aGui.println("There's nowhere you can go back to.");
126            return;
127        }
128        Room vNextRoom = this.aPreviousRooms.peek();//Returns the head element without modifying the Stack.
129        this.aCurrentRoom = vNextRoom;
130        this.aPreviousRooms.pop();//Removes the head element from this Stack.
131        this.printLocationInfo();
132    }
133
134    /**
135     * Afficher les informations localisation de salle actuel.
136     */
137    private void printLocationInfo() {
138        this.aGui.println(this.aCurrentRoom.getLongDescription());
139        if ( this.aCurrentRoom.getImgName() != null )
140            this.aGui.showImage( this.aCurrentRoom.getImgName() );
141    }
142
143    /**
144     * Afficher les informations de bienvenue et les informations de la position actuelle.
145     */
146    private void printWelcome() {
147        this.aGui.println("\nWelcome to the Secret of the Cat!\n"
148                + "Secret of the Cat is a new, incredibly boring adventure game.\n"
149                + "Type 'help' if you need help.\n");
150        this.printLocationInfo();
151    }
152
153    /**
154     * Afficher les informations d'aide.
155     */
156    private void printHelp() {
157        this.aGui.println("You are lost. You are alone.\n"
158                + "You wander around at the laboratory.\n\n"
159                + "Your command words are:"+this.aParser.getCommands()+"\n");
160    }
161
162    /**
163     * traiter la commande quit.
164     * @param pCmd commande a traiter
165     */
166    private void quit(final Command pCmd) {
167        if (pCmd.hasSecondWord()) {
168            this.aGui.println("Quit what ?");
169        }else {
170            this.aGui.println("Thank you for playing.  Good bye.");
171            this.aGui.enable(false);
172        }
173    }
174
175    /**
176     * Traiter la commande du joueur.
177     * @param pCmd commande a traiter
178     */
179    public void interpretCommand(final String pCmd) {
180
181        this.aGui.println( "> " + pCmd );
182        Command vCmd = this.aParser.getCommand( pCmd );
183
184        if (vCmd.isUnknown()) {
185            this.aGui.println("Erreur du programmeur : commande non reconnue !");
186            return;
187        } else if (vCmd.getCommandWord().equals("go")) {
188            this.goRoom(vCmd);
189        } else if (vCmd.getCommandWord().equals("quit")) {
190            this.quit(vCmd);
191        } else if (vCmd.getCommandWord().equals("help")) {
192            this.printHelp();
193        } else if (vCmd.getCommandWord().equals("look")) {
194            this.look(vCmd);
195        } else if (vCmd.getCommandWord().equals("eat")) {
196            this.eat();
197        } else if (vCmd.getCommandWord().equals("back")) {
198            this.back(vCmd);
199        } else {
200            this.aGui.println("I don't know what you mean...");
201        }
202    }
203
204    /**
205     * Afficher la description de la salle actuelle.
206     * @param pCmd commande a traiter apres le mot look
207     */
208    private void look(final Command pCmd){
209        if (pCmd.hasSecondWord()) {
210            this.aGui.println("I don't know how to look at something in particular yet.");
211        }
212        this.aGui.println(this.aCurrentRoom.getLongDescription());
213    }
214
215    /**
216     * Afficher un message par raport a l'action de manger.
217     */
218    private void eat(){
219        this.aGui.println("You have eaten now and you are not hungry any more.");
220    }
221}
